name: FontWarz
description:
Seeking glory has a darker side... The Strong Numbaz always worshipped at the font of war. Manipulating their societal lower stratum, the letters, to despise one another was a fruitful, and ancient endeavour. The sans of time nurture little hope, that letters with nought but cosmetic differences would cease their vile torment of former brethren: "Curly Cretin!", "Straight Lacer!" merely slurs to some. But words, cut deep, and letters, deeper.

Welcome to FontWarz! DenseTurd's sequel to our smash-hit submission from last year's RanibowJam; STRONG NUMBAZ!

Remember to liberate your troops! (read the guide)
